Chameleon::

Chameleon scales became gray and he started shake "It's not fa=
ir!!!!" said the male "Why have I to stand things like this??? isn't it eno=
ught that I have to stand every taunt of most bots of this base?"

After th=
at complaint he started to type in the console every time he type the passw=
ord in computer's screen appears "password wasn't accepted"

"Well" said th=
e male while he turned the chair and looked to Bullet "I just have a thing =
to do..."

  Bullet tightened his grip, not happy about what he'd just heard. =

ces that
  it'll take a Millenium to reassemble you." The bully pushed Cham=
eleon toward
  a nearby console, "You know what to do, or do I have to make=

  clear?"

  Blaze didn't want to get involved, she knew that =
Bullet wasn't fond of her
  and wasn't going to become his next target. Sub=
consciously she wanted to
  know what was going on too. She remembered an e=
xplosion that knocked her
  offline but her memory circuits were staticy be=
fore that. Somehow she knew
  that her and Bullet had to stick together.
